steps: Recruit four non-English-speaking students (mules) through fake job offers.
Instruct mules to open bank accounts using fabricated employment documentation.
Divide $200,000 into five $40,000 increments for each mule.
Direct mules to deposit cash and receive multi-currency wire transfers to account.
Mules transfer funds in daily $9,999 chunks to offshore facilitator accounts.
Facilitator consolidates funds into legitimate offshore real estate transactions.
evasion_techniques: Exploiting weak AML verification for student accounts
Using currency conversion to obfuscate trail
